description: Eco Finca Kanari focuses on transforming traditional coffee farming into a sustainable agroecological model. Since 2008, they have diversified their production to include specialty coffee, cocoa, and bananas, while also emphasizing environmental conservation. By establishing a nature reserve and engaging in community tourism, they aim to educate consumers about sustainable practices and promote biodiversity, all while navigating the challenges of agroecological markets and maintaining profitability.
name: Eco Finca Kanari
